fr:mainmatter.fr:p:
Let (S \triangleright P, \iota ^S, \otimes ^S, \text {pr}^S) and (T \triangleright Q, \iota ^T, \otimes ^T, \text {pr}^T) be lmf-containers and (u_1 , u_2, v_1, v_2) be a lmf-container distributive law. We define a knit composite (S \triangleright P \circ T \triangleright Q, \iota , \otimes , \text {pr}) where
\begin {align*} \iota &:= (\iota ^S , \lambda \_ . \iota ^T)\\ (s , f) \otimes (s' , f') &:= (\\ &s \otimes ^S (u_1\ s'\ f) ,\\ &\lambda p . u_2\ s'\ f\ (pr^S_2\ p) \otimes ^T f'\ (v_1\ (pr^S_2\ p))\ \\ &)\\ \end {align*}
